body:
## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

Android Studio `3.1 Beta 1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 21.2.3` • Dart plugin `173.4301.22`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

comment_data.body: We don't currently support Android Studio 3.1; you can follow https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/1650 for progress. Thanks for the report!

title: Shows error all the time
